title: Free Mystery Skins?
body: Thought we were supposed to get free mystery skins per 4 extra rune pages we bought before the patch went live?

replies.body: This is true for players who purchased rune pages with RP before September 1.  It looks like you received yours already, Cosmic Dusk Xayah.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=O4xfTsfg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-17T16:59:59.958+0000)
>
> This is true for players who purchased rune pages with RP before September 1.  It looks like you received yours already, Cosmic Dusk Xayah.  Let me know if that clears things up!

was it just one skin? I thought I had enough rune pages for more
Indeed!  You did buy additional rune pages but they were with IP, which went towards your BE conversion.
